content.question: The coexistence of rulers and councils of elders in African states in the period circa 1200â€“1450 best demonstrates

choices.label: an attempt to imitate the feudal governments of European states and East Asian empires
the influence of indigenous African political practices
an adaptation to the climatic conditions of the East African coast
a reflection of the hardships and uncertainties faced by Muslim seaborne traders

content.answer: the influence of indigenous African political practices

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Explain a historical concept, development, or process.
